subs.text: If you're reading RSS and Atom feeds in Node apps, you need feedparser, written by my friend Dan MacTough. I've been using his code in my own "River5" for years. It's solid and dependable. As a gesture of gratitude I published example code yesterday that helps you get started with feedparser.
"You can fake caring but you can't fake showing up." Not sure said this, but it's an important idea.
Timothy Snyder: "Our president is a minor Russian oligarch with major Russian debts."
I post too much Twitter stuff to my blog. I know it.
